alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 4:32PM MST until October 15 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 432 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 16 miles southeast of Florence to 9 miles southeast of Coolidge Airport to near Picacho, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Florence, Coolidge, La Palma, Blackwater, Magma, Randolph, Coolidge Airport and Valley Farms. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 87 between mile markers 124 and 144. AZ Route 79 between mile markers 130 and 145. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
